headline: AIG Leads Launch of Syndicate 2478 at Lloyd’s Through Multi-Year Blackstone Strategic Relationship
summary: NEW YORK, December 13, 2024--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that it has led the launch of a new reinsurance syndicate at Lloyd’s. Syndicate 2478 will commence underwriting from January 1, 2025, and will be a multi-year participant on AIG’s outwards reinsurance program.

headline: AIG Announces Results and Upsizing of Its Tender Offers for Certain Outstanding Notes
summary: NEW YORK, December 13, 2024--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced the results of its previously announced 12 separate offers (the "Offers") to purchase for cash the notes of the series listed in the table below (collectively, the "Notes") and that it has amended the Offers by increasing the applicable Maximum Purchase Consideration from $750 million to $1.16 billion.
